description: This course is about manage a model to make natural portrait in lingerie e nude art style. It could be appear simple, but also if you have a really nice model, why you could get a bad result? It's all up on you! Manage light and set first, but the goal of this course is to give you my little, but important, secret to get and original and unrepeatable shot. You will know how to move on set, what to say to the model, how to say that and view in real time the model's feedback. I show you every shot I make in my journey just for show which are the steps to follow in order to obtain a complete emotional, elegante, nude art and lingerie shot with Arianna, the model in this course!
title: Nude Art & Lingerie Portraiture with Off Camera Flash
